issues.title: Power Outage in Victoria Island
issues.description: Complete power outage affecting multiple buildings in the Victoria Island area. Reported by multiple residents. The outage started around 2 PM and is still ongoing.

updates.text: Issue has been reported to Eko Electric. Awaiting response.

issues.title: Major Traffic Jam on Third Mainland Bridge
issues.description: Severe traffic congestion on the Third Mainland Bridge due to an accident. Traffic is backed up for several kilometers. Avoid this route if possible.

updates.text: Accident cleared but traffic still heavy. FRSC on scene directing traffic.

issues.title: Flash Flooding in Ikeja
issues.description: Heavy rainfall has caused significant flooding in the Ikeja GRA area. Several roads are impassable. Residents advised to avoid low-lying areas.

updates.text: LASEMA has been notified and is monitoring the situation.
Water levels receding but some areas still affected.

issues.title: Garbage Accumulation in Surulere
issues.description: Piles of uncollected garbage on Bode Thomas Street. The waste has been there for over a week and is causing environmental concerns.

issues.title: Suspicious Activity Reported in Lekki Phase 1
issues.description: Residents have reported suspicious individuals loitering in the area, particularly in the evenings. Local security has been alerted.

updates.text: Police patrol has been increased in the area.
No further incidents reported. Situation appears resolved.

issues.title: Intermittent Power Supply in Yaba
issues.description: Frequent power fluctuations and outages in the Yaba area. Affecting businesses and residents. Reported to Ikeja Electric.

issues.title: Road Construction Causing Delays on Apapa-Oshodi Expressway
issues.description: Ongoing road construction is causing significant traffic delays during peak hours. Commuters should seek alternative routes.

issues.title: Drainage Blockage in Ajegunle
issues.description: Blocked drainage system causing water to overflow onto roads and into compounds after rainfall. Needs urgent attention.

issues.title: Illegal Dumping Site in Agege
issues.description: An illegal dumping site has emerged near the railway line. Creating health hazards and attracting pests.

issues.title: Street Lights Not Working in Gbagada
issues.description: Multiple street lights out in the Gbagada area, creating security concerns after dark. Reported to appropriate authorities.

issues.title: Transformer Fault in Mushin
issues.description: A faulty transformer is affecting power supply to several streets in the Mushin area. Repair team has been dispatched.

issues.title: Potholes Causing Traffic on Lagos-Ibadan Expressway
issues.description: Multiple large potholes on the Lagos-Ibadan Expressway near Berger are causing traffic slowdowns and vehicle damage.

issues.title: Erosion Threat in Badagry
issues.description: Soil erosion threatening properties along the coastal area. Urgent intervention needed to prevent further damage.

issues.title: Public Toilet Facility in Disrepair in Oshodi
issues.description: The public toilet facility at Oshodi market is in poor condition, creating sanitation issues for traders and visitors.

issues.title: Abandoned Vehicle Causing Concern in Anthony
issues.description: An abandoned vehicle has been parked in the same spot for over two weeks, raising security concerns among residents.

updates.text: Vehicle has been removed by authorities. Issue resolved.
